did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Student notebooks, a syllabus, work sheets, and preliminary exams for courses in botany, geology, and home economics. Includes Cornell University Official Examination Book (blue book).

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Ruth Strong received a B.S. degree from the College of Home Economics at Cornell University in 1955.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Student notebooks, a syllabus, work sheets, and preliminary exams for courses in botany, geology, and home economics.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ruth Strong papers, #37-5-2334. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related collection: Everett M. Strong. Papers, #11-8-2335.
Related collection: Phillips Hall Women's Club. Records, #11-8-2333.
